original_title: Ebony Chunky Love: Bitch Can't Get a Date!
overview: Ask Keith Price how he is, and you can bet he'll answer "Fabulous!" a term which also describes his one-man show. In Ebony Chunky Love, the NYC-based stand-up comic and Sirius OUT Q radio personality recounts his attempts to find success on the comedy circuit, his experiences as a person of color growing up gay in Texas, and his adventures in dating in the big city.
title: Ebony Chunky Love: Bitch Can't Get a Date!
